questions_and_notes: lambda865nm should be included in dimensions; Why is the wavelength inconsistent with lambda870nm used for od870aer-tavg-z0-hxy-x (od870aer-AERmon)?

comment: Total aerosol AOD due to dust aerosol at a wavelength of 865 nanometres.
